welcome.title: Welcome to T+
welcome.line1: Your account has been successfully created — welcome aboard!
welcome.line2:
To help you get started, we've activated a 3-month free trial, giving you immediate
access to a selection of core services. Explore now and discover how T+ can support
your business.

getStartedTips.title: Get Started Tips
getStartedTips.context: Follow these 3 steps to unlock the full potential of T+

steps.title: Complete Your Profile
steps.description: Fill in your user and company profile to access all T+ platform features

steps.title: Apply for Digital Identity
steps.description: Create your verified digital identity to securely access T+ services

steps.title: Explore Services
steps.description: Use the menu bar to browse and try out all available services

freeTrialFeatures.title: Free Trial Features
freeTrialFeatures.context: You can start using these features right away (some with limited access):

list.title: SignConnect
list.context: Sign documents via Tradelink's DMSS using a certified digital identity (limited signing quota).

list.title: PayConnect
list.context: Enjoy exclusive offers on financial services provided by T+ partners.

list.title: GovConnect
list.context: Use smart trade functions to automate and enhance trade compliance.

list.title: SafeConnect
list.context: Access cybersecurity services for individuals and corporations (some features may be limited).

remarks.body: Note: Some features may require a subscription after the trial period ends. Click on the relevant pages in the menu to start using them.

featuresTBC.title: Features Available Soon
featuresTBC.context: These advanced features are being rolled out progressively. Some will only be available with a subscription:

list.title: SignConnect
list.context: Sign via other platforms (e.g. DocuSign, Fadada) and access premium features such as AI Document Assistant and AI Legal Assistant — exclusive to T+ members.

list.title: BizConnect
list.context: Comprehensive business intelligence, due diligence services, and global market entry support launching soon.

list.title: GovConnect
list.context: Use advanced AI tools to automate trade compliance (e.g. AI-powered customs automation) and connect to more government services via T+.

list.title: SafeConnect
list.context: Add-on cybersecurity services, such as additional web vulnerability assessments.

list.title: ESG
list.context: Track your environmental impact through paperless signing, and download annual ESG certificates or badges/reports from T+ partners with exclusive offers.

remarks.title: Ready to upgrade?
remarks.context: Unlock all features by subscribing to our plans — launching soon!
